column2: Shatter shoulder in foe's shield arm. Arm is quite useless. Foe drops shield, if he has one.
column4: Drive elbow backwards and break it. Arm is useless. Foe drops weapon, leans way over, and yells out.
column6: That does it for him. Your strike lands on foe's knee. The knee buckles and foe goes down hard.
column8: Masterful strike to foe's head. If he has no helm, he is dead. If he has a helm, he is knocked out for 4 hours.
column10: Crush what was once foe's head; he dies instantly. If foe has a helm, it is destroyed also. You are speckled with blood.

column6: Foe yells out before the impact and is silenced by the blow. Ribs crack.

column2: Strike foe in lower back. Muscles and cartilage are damaged.
column4: Foe makes a mistake and pays. You send him prone with a fell strike. Tendons are smashed.
column6: Powerful blow sweeps foe onto his back. Bones break and muscles tear.
column8: Blow to foe's neck. If foe has a throat protector, he is paralyzed from the neck down. If not, he dies in 2 rounds.
column10: Neck strike shatters bone and severs an artery. Foe cannot breath. Foe is inactive and suffocates in 12 rounds.

column2: Break foe's nose.

column2: Blow to foe's head. If foe has no helm, he is dead. If foe has a helm, he is knocked down.
column4: Blast foe's chest. Send ribcage into heart. Foe drops and dies in 6 rounds.
column6: Blow to foe's abdomen. Strike destroys a variety of organs. Poor fool expires after 6 rounds of inactivity.
column8: Crush foe's chest cavity. He grips your arm, looks into your eyes, then drops and dies in 3 rounds.
column10: Blow to foe's face. If visored, the visor is driven into his face and foe dies in 10 rounds. Without a visor, he dies instantly. You have half a round left.

column2: Crush foe's jaw. Drive bone through brain. Foe dies instantly.
column4: Blow snaps neck. Foe is paralyzed from the shoulders down.
